metadata.mission: Remove pr, code, and test entirely — MCP tools, CLI commands, and core/testing.py — eliminating runtime registration, discovery exposure, CLI entry points, and all references across docs, prompts, and tests in one atomic PR.
assumptions: CLI pr and test commands remain intact — only MCP tool surface is removed
No staged deprecation window — tools are removed atomically
code tool has no runtime router module — removal is discovery/manifest only
Removing tools from capabilities manifest is a breaking contract change requiring semver major bump
Core logic modules (core/pr.py, core/test.py) are out of scope and must not be modified
SUPERSEDES a-1: CLI pr and test commands are ALSO removed (not just MCP surface)
SUPERSEDES a-5: core/testing.py IS in scope for deletion (only consumers are tools/unified/test.py and cli/commands/testing.py, both being deleted). core/review.py stays.

metadata.description: Remove pr and test from the unified tool runtime so the MCP server no longer registers them. Delete the router modules.

task-1-1.title: Remove pr/test imports and registration from __init__.py

metadata.description: Remove register_unified_pr_tool and register_unified_test_tool imports, registration branches, and __all__ entries.
acceptance_criteria: pr/test registration branches removed from register_unified_tools()

metadata.description: Delete the pr.py unified router module entirely.
Delete the test.py unified router module entirely.
Confirm register_unified_tools can be imported without errors referencing pr/test. Run: python -c 'from foundry_mcp.tools.unified import register_unified_tools'
Remove pr, code, and test from all discovery surfaces — server manifest builder and static capabilities manifest. Bump manifest version for contract change.

task-2-1.title: Remove pr/test from server.py manifest builder

metadata.description: In _build_unified_manifest_tools: remove _PR_ROUTER and _TEST_ROUTER imports, remove pr/test entries from routers, categories, and descriptions dicts.

task-2-2.title: Remove pr/code/test from capabilities_manifest.json and bump versions

metadata.description: Remove tool objects for pr, code, test from tools.unified array. Remove pr, code, test from unified_tools.tools list. Update unified_tools.description count 16→13. Bump schema_version 1.1.0→2.0.0. Bump server.version 0.5.1→0.6.0.
acceptance_criteria: pr tool object removed from tools.unified
code tool object removed from tools.unified
test tool object removed from tools.unified

metadata.description: Run: python -m json.tool mcp/capabilities_manifest.json >/dev/null. Verify no pr/code/test tool entries remain.
Remove references to pr and test as MCP tools from prompt guidance and config templates. Ensure only still-available tools are presented.

task-3-1.title: Remove test MCP guidance from workflows.py

metadata.description: Remove or replace test(action='run') and test(action='discover') prompt guidance. Add note that test execution is CLI-only.

task-3-2.title: Remove pr/test from environment.py TOML template

metadata.description: Remove pr and test from the TOML template comment listing available unified tools.
acceptance_criteria: pr removed from tool list comment
test removed from tool list comment

verify-3-1.title: Verify no MCP tool references to pr/test in prompts/config

metadata.description: Run: rg -n 'test\(action=|pr\(action=' src/foundry_mcp/prompts src/foundry_mcp/tools/unified/environment.py — expect no matches.
Remove stale MCP tool references from user-facing and developer documentation. Add migration note about CLI alternatives.

task-4-1.title: Remove pr/code/test from MCP tool reference

metadata.description: Remove overview rows for pr, code, test. Remove ## test section. Update top-level tool count. Add migration note about CLI alternatives.
acceptance_criteria: test overview row and section removed

task-4-2.title: Remove MCP mappings from docs README

metadata.description: Remove 'Run tests' MCP mapping. Remove CLI-to-MCP rows for test run / test discover.

task-4-3.title: Remove MCP equivalents from CLI command reference

metadata.description: Remove or replace MCP equivalents for test and pr commands in Command Groups Overview and individual sections.
acceptance_criteria: MCP equivalent lines for test removed or replaced
MCP equivalent lines for pr removed or replaced

task-4-4.title: Update naming conventions with new router list

metadata.description: Remove pr, code, test from canonical unified router lists. Update count: 16 → 13 (manifest) / 14 (runtime).

verify-4-1.title: Verify no stale MCP tool references in docs

metadata.description: Run targeted rg sweeps for MCP: test, MCP: pr, pr/test as tool references in docs/ and dev_docs/.
Align test suite with reduced router inventory. Remove pr/test entries from baselines, update count assertions, delete dedicated test files.

task-5-1.title: Remove pr/test from MCP smoke test tool names

metadata.description: Remove 'pr' and 'test' from _UNIFIED_TOOL_NAMES set. Update docstring/count wording.

task-5-2.title: Remove pr/test from registration parity test

metadata.description: Remove _PR_ROUTER/_TEST_ROUTER imports. Remove from parity mapping and TOOL_NAMES parametrized list.

task-5-3.title: Remove pr/test from dispatch common test

metadata.description: Remove pr/test baseline entries from DISPATCH_BASELINES. Update router-count assertions: 16 → 14.

task-5-4.title: Remove pr/test from telemetry invariants test

metadata.description: Remove pr/test from ROUTER_BASELINES. Update count assertions.
Update 'all 16 routers' docstring to 'all 14 routers'.
Delete tests/tools/unified/test_pr.py entirely.
Delete tests/tools/unified/test_test.py entirely.

Run all affected test files: pytest tests/integration/test_mcp_smoke.py tests/tools/unified/test_tool_registration_parity.py tests/tools/unified/test_dispatch_common.py tests/tools/unified/test_telemetry_invariants.py tests/unit/test_contracts/test_dispatch_contracts.py
Fix all remaining hardcoded 16-router references. Run comprehensive stale reference sweep and full test suite.

task-6-1.title: Update server.py module docstring router count

metadata.description: Change 'unified 16-router tool surface' to 'unified 14-router tool surface' in module docstring.

task-6-2.title: Update tools/__init__.py module docstring router count

metadata.description: Change 'unified 16-router tool surface' to 'unified 14-router tool surface' in module docstring.
Search for any remaining references to 16 routers across the codebase: rg -n '16.router|16 router' src tests docs dev_docs. Fix any found.

task-6-4.title: Sweep for stale pr/test/code import references

metadata.description: Search for stale references: rg -n 'unified\.pr|unified\.test|register_unified_pr_tool|register_unified_test_tool|test\(action=|pr\(action=' src tests docs dev_docs mcp. Fix any found.
acceptance_criteria: No stale import or action references to removed tools

metadata.description: Run: pytest tests/tools/unified && pytest (full suite). All tests must pass.

phase-7.title: Remove CLI Commands and Core Modules

metadata.description: Remove CLI pr and test command groups, their registry entries, and the core/testing.py module (no other consumers). core/review.py stays since it is used by the review tool.
Delete the pr.py CLI command module entirely. Contains pr create, context, and status subcommands.
Delete the testing.py CLI command module entirely. Contains test run, discover, presets, check-tools, quick, unit, consult subcommands.
Remove pr_group and test_group imports and exports from the CLI commands package init.
Remove pr_group and test_group imports and registration calls from register_all_commands().
Delete core/testing.py — only consumers were tools/unified/test.py and cli/commands/testing.py, both being deleted. No other imports exist.
acceptance_criteria: No remaining imports of foundry_mcp.core.testing anywhere

verify-7-1.title: Verify CLI imports cleanly without pr/test

metadata.description: Run: python -c 'from foundry_mcp.cli.registry import register_all_commands' — should succeed without pr/test references.

task-5-8.title: Fix additional pr/test references in telemetry invariants test

metadata.description: Beyond ROUTER_BASELINES (task 5-4), also remove pr/test from _DISPATCH_SIGNATURES, _KEYWORD_ONLY_DISPATCH, and the _call_dispatch() branch. Update test_all_16_routers_covered method name and assertion to 14.
Remove the foundry_mcp.tools.unified.pr entry from the EXPECTED_SPEC_PUBLIC_API dictionary. After pr.py is deleted, this import-based test will fail with ModuleNotFoundError.

task-4-5.title: Remove test/code tool examples from development guide

metadata.description: Remove test(action='run', preset='full'), test(action='discover'), code(action='find-function'), and code(action='trace') examples from the tool usage table.
Remove tools/unified/pr.py consumer row and update the router inventory list to remove _PR_ROUTER and _TEST_ROUTER.
Delete the planning precursor file now that the spec captures all requirements.

task-5-10.title: Remove pr/test CLI test classes from test_sdd_cli_core.py

metadata.description: Remove TestPRCommands class (tests pr status, pr context) and TestTestingCommands class from this file.

task-5-11.title: Remove pr/test from CLI integration test expected_groups

metadata.description: Remove TestRunTestsWorkflows class. Remove 'pr' and 'test' from expected_groups list in command group availability assertion.

task-3-3.title: Update verify node template in core/spec/hierarchy.py

metadata.description: Line 139 contains mcp_tool: mcp__foundry-mcp__test-run in a hardcoded verification node template. Update to remove the mcp_tool key or replace with a CLI-based command reference (e.g., pytest directly).

task-3-4.title: Remove test tool from environment.py permission preset

metadata.description: Remove mcp__foundry-mcp__test from the standard permissions preset in _update_permissions(). Currently at line 129.

task-4-7.title: Update testing guide to remove MCP and core/testing.py references

metadata.description: Remove reference to src/foundry_mcp/core/testing.py (being deleted). Remove test(action='run', preset='full') and test(action='discover') MCP tool call examples. Note that test presets are CLI-only.

task-4-8.title: Remove code tool references from best practices docs

metadata.description: Remove code(action='trace'), code(action='impact'), and code(action=...) references from dev_docs/mcp_best_practices/06-pagination-streaming.md and dev_docs/cli_best_practices/01-cli-runtime.md. Replace with currently-available tool examples.
